com.yubico.jaas

Class YubikeyLoginModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yubico.jaas.YubikeyLoginModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoginModule

    public class YubikeyLoginModule
extends Object
implements LoginModule
    A JAAS module for verifying OTPs (One Time Passwords) against a Yubikey Validation Service.
    Author:
    Fredrik Thulin

      • validate_otps

        private boolean validate_otps(List<String> otps,
                    NameCallback nameCb)
                       throws LoginException
        Try to validate all the OTPs provided.
        Parameters:
        otps - Possible YubiKey OTPs
        nameCb - JAAS callback to get authenticating username
        Returns:
        true if one or more of the OTPs validated OK, otherwise false
        Throws:
        LoginException - for exceptions during validation, logging real exception at warn level

      • is_right_user

        private boolean is_right_user(String username,
                    String publicId)
        After validation of an OTP, check that it came from a YubiKey that actually belongs to the user trying to authenticate.
        Parameters:
        username - Username to match against YubiKey publicId.
        publicId - The public ID of the authenticated YubiKey.
        Returns:
        true if the username matched the YubiKey, false otherwise

      • get_tokens

        private List<String> get_tokens(NameCallback nameCb)
        Get username and token(s) from the application, using the javax.security.auth.callback.CallbackHandler passed to our initialize() function. The tokens returned have been identified as plausible YubiKey OTPs.
        Parameters:
        nameCb -
        Returns:
        list of possible YubiKey OTPs
